intro: Rotanga, commonly known as the African violet, is a popular ornamental plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the genus Saintpaulia and is characterized by its vibrant, showy flowers that come in a variety of colors. The plant has heart-shaped leaves that are velvety to the touch and are often used as a decorative element in homes and gardens.
